a.n: Nazareth - Homecoming - Greatest Hits Live Glasgow

p.d: Recorded Live at The Garage, Glasgow, October 20, 2001, this intimate performance includes most of the bands classics such as 'Razamanaz', 'My White Bicycle', and 'Hair of The Dog', and more recent songs including 'When the Light Comes Down' from their 1998 studio album Boogaloo.
